string.value: So what exactly happened to make you return to the island? You'd better go talk to #b#p1201002##k.

#p1201002# was devastated to have his #t4032312# stolen! The thief responsible for this mess, #o9001013#, apparently headed toward #m140020300#. Maybe he's planning to escape on a boat. You need to go to #m140020300# and battle #r#o9001013##k.\r\n\r\n#o9001013##r #a213011##k
You successfully eliminated #o9001013#, but the #t4032312# was nowhere to be found. When #p1201002# found out what happened, he went crazy.

There's a robber on this island! I don't know who it is, but the thief removed a #b#t4032312##k from my body! I'm sure the thief disguised himself as a penguin, so no one would notice him, and then he just walked right out with it!

I kept screaming, but no one paid any attention, so that really got me frustrated. Worse, that girl #p1201000# kept trying to tie me up because I was making too much noise. Seriously, I can't deal with human beings.

Wait, we don't have much time. You must catch the thief before he leaves the island! He took the #t4032312# and headed towards the #bharbor#k. He was walking, as casually as could be, so I'm sure he is still on this island. Catch that thief for me!
Who's the thief? That's easy! Which bird loves gems? Crows of course! #r#o9001013##k's the thief!
What? What?! You don't want to? I thought you said I have to look my best for you to use your skills, and now you're telling me this? No way! You must do this for me!
You still haven't captured #r#o9001013##k yet? He's probably headed toward the #bharbor#k, so maybe you'll find him there? Hurry up!
